page.title: 04Knostrop Lane
page.content: We went down a lane where there were a lot of bushes, trees and{weeds. Behind the trees there were fields; then we saw the{Chemical works.}The photography group took a few photos of us, then we walked on. The road was rough and stony; it was also dusty. We then saw a sign saying "Private Road" so we did not go to the{sewage works. The only people we saw were going past in{cars, lorries and vans. Knostrop Lane was also gravelly and quiet. There was a lot of grass and rubbish like tyres, old beds and a sofa in muddy bogs. At the{Chemical {works}we saw a lot of huts and containers which may contain liquids. The grass around was long, with {weeds}such as{daisies, buttercups, {Mother Dies and dog daisies.
